qas.question: What is the name of the largest Presbyterian church in Mexico?

answers.text: National Presbyterian Church in Mexico (Iglesia Nacional Presbiteriana de México)

qas.question: How many members are in the National Presbyterian Church in Mexico?
When was the Associate Reformed Presbyterian Church in Mexico formed?
Which is the smallest Presbyterian church in Mexico?
The National Presbyterian Church had 3000 members and how many congregations?
The National Presbyterian Church had 2,500,000 congregations and how many members?
In what year was the Associate Reformed National Church formed?
Where is the smallest Presbyterian church located?

context: The biggest Presbyterian church is the <a0_0><b3_0>National Presbyterian Church<b3_0/> in <b7_0>Mexico<b7_0/> (Iglesia Nacional Presbiteriana de México)<a0_0/>, which has around <a1_0><b4_0>2,500,000<b4_0/><a1_0/> members and associates and <b5_0>3000<b5_0/> congregations, but there are other small denominations like the Associate Reformed Presbyterian Church in Mexico which was founded in <a2_0><b6_0>1875<b6_0/><a2_0/> by the Associate Reformed Church in North America. The Independent Presbyterian Church and the Presbyterian Reformed Church in Mexico, the National Conservative Presbyterian Church in Mexico are existing churches in the Reformed tradition.
